<title level="1" right="Focus 10" pfs="Standard">
[Hero's Defiance](/Spells.aspx?ID=2051)
<actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 256 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** An attack would bring you to 0 Hit Points.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You shout in defiance and are filled with a burst of healing. Just before applying the attack's damage, you recover 6d8+20 Hit Points. If this is enough to prevent the attack from bringing you to 0 Hit Points, you don't become [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) or dying. Either way, cheating death is difficult, and you can't use _hero's defiance_ again until you [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=2621) or make your daily preparations. _Hero's defiance_ can't be used against effects with the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) trait or that would leave no remains, such as [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1492).
name: Hero's Defiance
